key.name: priority
key.summary: Priority to use for this plugin
key.description: Priority to use for this plugin in unity-settings-daemon startup queue

key.name: active
key.description: Whether this plugin would be activated by unity-settings-daemon or not

key.name: recalibrate-display-threshold
key.summary: The duration a display profile is valid
key.description: This is the number of days after which the display color profile is considered invalid.

key.name: recalibrate-printer-threshold
key.summary: The duration a printer profile is valid
key.description: This is the number of days after which the printer color profile is considered invalid.

key.name: night-light-enabled
key.summary: If the night light mode is enabled
key.description: Night light mode changes the color temperature of your display when the sun has gone down or at preset times.

key.name: night-light-temperature
key.summary: Temperature of the display when enabled
key.description: This temperature in Kelvin is used to modify the screen tones when night light mode is enabled. Higher values are bluer, lower redder.

key.name: night-light-schedule-automatic
key.description: Calculate the sunrise and sunset times automatically, from the current location.

key.name: night-light-schedule-from
key.description: When “night-light-schedule-automatic” is disabled, use this start time in hours from midnight.

key.name: night-light-schedule-to
key.description: When “night-light-schedule-automatic” is disabled, use this end time in hours from midnight.

key.name: night-light-last-coordinates
key.description: When location services are available this represents the last detected location. The default value is an invalid value to ensure it is always updated at startup.
